item.title: Harissa Chicken Traybake
item.description: Ingredients 3 tbsp harissa 3 tbsp low-fat natural yogurt 4 skinless chicken breasts, slashed 1 small butternut squash, peeled, deseeded and cut into wedges 2 red onions, cut into wedges (Other vegetables also work, such as shallots, sweet potato(!), peppers, etc) Method Heat oven to 200C/180C fan. Mix 2 tbsp of harissa with the yogurt and rub all over the chicken breasts and set aside to marinate while you start the veg.
